catentdesc.name: Cold Be-Gone Vitamin C and Zinc Lozenges
catentdesc.shortdescription: Immune booster and soothing relief for your sore throat.
catentdesc.longdescription: Cold-Be-Gone's lozenges provide instant relief from sore throats due to cold and help boost your immune system by providing it with vitamins and minerals. Each lozenge contains 10 mg of Zinc.

catentdesc.name: Healthy Boost Blood Booster
catentdesc.shortdescription: Boost your energy and lower reduce the risk of anemia.
catentdesc.longdescription: Iron is essential for normal thyroid hormone metabolism. Healthy Boost's Blood booster contains iron (ferrous sulphate) as well as Vitamin C which helps in the absorption of iron.

catentdesc.name: Healthy Boost One a Day Multi-Vitamin for Women
catentdesc.shortdescription: One a day pill to improve overall health for women.
catentdesc.longdescription: Healthy Boost's multivitamin for women is designed specifically to strengthen bones, improve kidney and liver functioning, reduce stress, and improve skin tone.

catentdesc.name: Healthy Boost Golden Root Complex
catentdesc.shortdescription: Designed especially for men! Golden Root Complex improves circulation, energy, and libido.
catentdesc.longdescription: Golden Root has long been known to increase circulation thereby promoting energy, decreasing general malaise, and naturally increasing libido. Each package contains 12 capsules with each capsule containing 300 mg.

catentdesc.name: Regular Strength Acetaminophen
catentdesc.longdescription: For quick acting pain relief. Each pill contains 325 mg of acetaminophen. Each bottle contains 140 pills.

catentdesc.name: Cold-Be-Gone Cold and Sinus Gel Caps
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fast acting cold and sinus relief.
catentdesc.longdescription: For effective relief of congestion, sinus pain, headache, sore throat and fever. Active Ingredients 150 mg solubilized ibuprofen / Pseudoephedrine HCI 60 mg Analgesic / Decongestant. Each bottle contains 140 gel caps.

catentdesc.name: Healthy Boost St. John's Wort Oil
catentdesc.longdescription: For over 500 years, St. John's wort has been used to treat depression, insomnia, and general irritability. St. John's wort is a natural anti-depressant that promotes a balanced emotional well being.

catentdesc.name: Healthy Boost Ginkgo Biloba
catentdesc.shortdescription: Promotes blood circulation and provides relief from arthritic pain.
catentdesc.longdescription: Increases oxygen absorption into blood as well as general blood circulation. Rich in antioxidants, Ginkgo Biloba is also powerful against the effects of arthritis and atherosclerosis. Each bottle contains 25 capsules.

catentdesc.name: Healthy Boost Bismuth Subsalicylate
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fast acting relief for heartburn and nausea.
catentdesc.longdescription: Bismuth subsalicylate is used to treat nausea, heartburn, diarrhea, and indigestion. The liquid form is fast acting as it is absorbed quicker than pill form. Available in a 240 ml bottle. Cherry flavored.

catentdesc.name: All-In-One Cold and Flu Syrup
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fast acting relief for cold and flu symptoms.
catentdesc.longdescription: Our All-In-One Cold and Flu formula provides effective relief from dry cough, chills, congestion, sore throat, fever, sinus pain and a runny nose. Grape flavored. Bottle is 180 ml.
